additions.new_text: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "header missing skiping one byte\n")
additions.new_line_content: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "header missing skiping one byte\n");

additions.new_text: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "Error while decoding mpeg audio frame\n")
additions.new_line_content: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "Error while decoding mpeg audio frame\n"); //FIXME return -1 / but also return the number of bytes consumed

additions.new_text: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "Codec extradata missing or too short.\n")
additions.new_line_content: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "Codec extradata missing or too short.\n");

additions.old_line_content: // Allocate zeroed memory for the first decoder context
granules[ch][0].scfsi = 0; /* all scale factors are transmitted */

additions.new_text:
dprintf("region=%d n=%d x=%d y=%d exp=%d\n",
                    i, g->region_size[i] - j, x, y, exponent)

additions.old_line_content: /* now we get bits from the main_data_begin offset */

additions.new_text:
dprintf("scfsi=%x gr=%d ch=%d scale_factors:\n",
                           g->scfsi, gr, ch)

deletions.old_text: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "header missing skiping one byte\n")
deletions.old_line_content: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "header missing skiping one byte\n");

deletions.new_line_content: /* free format: prepare to compute frame size */

deletions.old_text: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "Error while decoding mpeg audio frame\n")
deletions.old_line_content: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_DEBUG, "Error while decoding mpeg audio frame\n"); //FIXME return -1 / but also return the number of bytes consumed

deletions.old_text: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "Codec extradata missing or too short.\n")
deletions.old_line_content: av_log(avctx, AV_LOG_ERROR, "Codec extradata missing or too short.\n");

deletions.new_line_content: // Put decoder context in place to make init_decode() happy

deletions.old_text:
dprintf("region=%d n=%d x=%d y=%d exp=%d\n",
                    i, g->region_size[i] - j, x, y, exponent)
deletions.new_line_content: i, g->region_size[i] - j, x, y, exponent);
/* if MS stereo only is selected, we precompute the
/* now we get bits from the main_data_begin offset */

dprintf("scfsi=%x gr=%d ch=%d scale_factors:\n",
